string-array.name: thresh_passive
string-array.item: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

string-array.name: thresh_first_ability
string-array.item: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

string-array.name: thresh_second_ability
string-array.item: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

string-array.name: thresh_third_ability
string-array.item: Thresh\'s attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

string-array.name: thresh_fourth_ability
string-array.item: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
